body.name: SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 8GB Graphics Card, 256Bit 2048SP GDDR5 AMD Video Card for Pc Gaming, DP HDMI DVI-Output, PCI Express 3.0 with Dual Fan for Office and Gaming
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 33 mins
features: ✔【Superior Gaminig Experience】AMD Radeon RX 580 8G is a mainstream gaming GPU built on the 14 nm process. The gpu has equipped with 2048SP and 8GB GDDR5 memory with a 1750 MHz (8 GB). Providing computer enthusiasts with a smoother, higher quality gaming experience.

✔【High Definition Display Effect】RX 580 8GB graphics card has 3 monitor support ouput included 1X Display Port + 1X HDMI Port + 1X DVI Port, can support three monitors. 580 is connected to the rest of the system using a PCI-Express 3.0 x16 interface, supports up to 8K display, delivers more higher definition pc gaming effect.

✔【Powerful Cooling Performance】Composite heat pipes of this RX580 can directly and greatly contact the GPU core. Dual cooling fans provide more airflow for optimal cooling performance and 3x quieter gameplay. Excellent quality electrical components and PCB board ensure its safety and stability.

✔【High Frame Rate Experience】 The superior performance of SHOWKINGS 580 graphic card ends up the unstable game play and broken frames with fluid, artifact-free performance at virtually any frame rate. Enhanced contrast and color provide an incredibly sharp,colorful and vivid visual experience.

✔【Multifunctional Use】This video card is designed to meet the needs of different people on the computer, powerful performance not only in the game to show quality graphics, the face of the office, design, audio and video can also be comfortable, multi-tasking, fast switching smooth operation. All RX 580 Graphics Card is from AMD where you could get a driver download. When installing the driver that comes with the card, you need to uninstall the previous driver software, otherwise it will not work.Welcome to contact us for quick help on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Value - A Game Changer!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 for my gaming PC, and I couldn't be more thrilled with its performance. This graphic card has truly transformed my gaming experience, and here's why:Unparalleled Performance: The SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 is an absolute beast when it comes to handling the latest AAA titles. I can now play games at ultra-high settings without any lag or stuttering. The frame rates are consistently smooth, which has significantly enhanced my gaming immersion.Effortless Installation: Installing the card was a breeze. It slotted perfectly into my motherboard, and the drivers were easy to install. I was up and running in no time, ready to enjoy the enhanced graphics.Silent Cooling: The cooling system on this graphic card is impressive. Even during intense gaming sessions, the card remains cool and quiet. I no longer have to deal with the annoying whir of fans while gaming.Value for Money: Considering the exceptional performance, the price of the SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 is incredibly reasonable. It provides outstanding value for money, especially when compared to other high-end graphic cards on the market.Future-Proofing: With support for the latest technologies and ample VRAM, I feel confident that this card will serve me well for years to come. It's an excellent investment for anyone looking to future-proof their gaming setup.Eye-Catching Design: The sleek and modern design of the card adds a touch of elegance to my gaming rig. It looks great through the transparent side panel of my PC case.In conclusion, the SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 has exceeded my expectations in every way. It has transformed my gaming experience, delivering exceptional performance, quiet operation, and excellent value for money. If you're a serious gamer looking to take your gameplay to the next level, I wholeheartedly recommend the SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580. It's a game-changer in every sense of the word!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Card works great with a Ryzen5 based system
reviews.reviewText: I'd built a system with a Ryzen 5 CPU for my wife, and because she's not big into gaming, I'd used a reasonably inexpensive Nvidia-based GPU. After several months, she continued to experience intermittent hangs/lockups of her display for a second or two. Checking Event Viewer, I could see that she was experiencing a driver crash, despite having the most up to date drivers.Thinking that getting an AMD-based Radeon GPU might solve the solution for her, I again looked for a reasonably inexpensive solution, but one that would provide a bit more gaming capabilities for her, as she does like to play Age of Empires every now and then. This SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 8GB Graphics Card, 256Bit 2048SP fit the bill perfectly and the price was right.Installation was of course easy and despite the larger size/fans the card is very quiet - a requirement for her - with the fans off most of the time.Best of all, the hangs/lockups are gone.Overall, very happy with the change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive card for keeping older system alive
reviews.reviewText: I recently built a new system but wanted to keep the old one running for awhile as a test mule. Its AMD Radeon HD 5970 was the absolute top dawg graphics card back in 2010 but recently it was having reliability issues to the point it often would not display anything. I picked up this Radeon RX 580 8GB for small $, slotted it in quickly, and it's been working great - for stuff like War Thunder it actually works quite well driving three 27" 1080P monitors (@60 hz, of course). Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding product and extremely fast shipping.
reviews.reviewText: This is a review of the SHOWKINGS Radeon RX 580 8GB Graphics Card, 256Bit 2048SP GDDR5 AMD Video Card. The card performs outstandingly. It was affordable and can handle most videogames based on reviews I have read. My primary usage is for movies and animation. I use Adobe Creative Cloud software and it really is a perfomance gobbling software. With rendering and the like, it slowed down my other, older computers. This new computer I built from parts hoping to improve rendering time and quality when I have more than one program open (like AE, Photoshop, twenty pages on the web, Fusion360, Word, and Adobe Premiere, all at the same time). The card handles graphics flawlessly - (and so does everything else on my $650 build PC). Performance is a lot like the Alienware top end computers so this card brings it. There are better and more expensive cards out there, and this is close to legacy, but with inflation, this card's going to be around for a long time to come thus future-proofing the build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a graphics upgrade!
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded from integrated GPU on AMD Ryzen 5600g, improved 3d Mark score on DirectX 12 free test from ~1400 to ~4500 and now we are able to change graphics settings from Low to High in games like MS Flight Sim or Fortnite. Whilst it may not be a good choice for high end gaming machines, for a $500 rig we bought my son last Xmas this is a massive upgrade! Card itself appears well made, definitely takes up a chunk of space so be prepared for tight fit if you other cables like SATA plugged into the motherboard in the space this card occupies. For $100ish I don’t think you’ll find a better GPU upgrade with this RX580.
